msg: Changed NIO sender to mark sending faults defferently from soap faults.

author: jacopoc
msg: Added script to select all the printers available in the server.

author: mbaessler
msg: add JCas support for UIMA runtime

author: dblevins
msg: Fixed some issues with nulls in security annotation processing.  Moved responsibility of run-as resolution into the security service.

author: jacopoc
msg: There is now a 'print' option in the select box in the header of the find order list.

By selecting it and submitting the form all the orders with the checkbox set will be submitted as async jobs: the user can monitor the status of the print jobs (one per order) in the WorkEffort->Submitted Jobs screen (the status will move from Pending to Running to Finished).
The system will render one postscript stream for each order (out of the screen definition) and send it to the first printer (that can handle postscript streams) that the server's JVM can locate.
